predicate.note: Frames file for 'unfold' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 45.4 (other causative), g'zillion other framed members. No Framenet entry. No comparison.

role.descr: thing that used to be folded

example.name: transitive
example.text: John carefully unfolded his laundry before dumping it on the floor.
example.arg: before dumping it on the floor

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: In fact, the earnings report unfolded as representatives of the world's No. 1 jet maker and the striking Machinists union came back to the negotiating table for their first meeting in two weeks.
example.arg: as representatives of the world's No. 1 jet maker and the striking Machinists union came back to the negotiating table for their first meeting in two weeks
